title: Ulaga Nayagane Song Lyrics Dasavathaaram

ragasiya kavignan (2)

orr uyir kondu
ulagathil indru
aayiram piravi kondaai
un vazhvil
aayiram piraigal kandaai

sothanai unnai

sorvura villai.

ayindhu mudhal nee
aadi vanthaalum
oxygen kuraiya villai
sonnaal kael
oscar thooram illai.

ulagam engilum
unnai minjida yaaru
unnai pettradhil

ulaga nayagane
ulaga nayagane

ini ayinaavum
will call you ..

udal konda manithan
oar avathaaram
ullathin kanakkil
noor avathaaram

mugangalai urithu

perukkonde arivu kondaai
vigynaani ..
purindhu kondaai.

vilaigalukkulle
virichangal thoongum
un ovvanukulle
ulagangal thoongum

neruppinil kidandhu
nedandavar siranthu
nee en nilai kandthaai
ippodhu nirubanam
aagivittaai.
